item.title: How do teachers describe their students?
item.description: Introduction DonorsChoose is a popular crowd-funding website created to help teachers get the supplies they need. I first heard of the website when I was 22 and teaching high school physics in New Orleans. DonorsChoose was an easy way for me to find funding for a model rocket project. Hereâ€™s a photo of me and a student (circa 2012) playing with our crowd-funded rockets: My student and I preparing for launch
